entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -41.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 08:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -41.7°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -46.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 41. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 44 with temperature rising to minus 40 by morning.
